name: Boxes: Going Places [OLC CodeJam 2020]
description:
The warehouse world is a great machine. You are a box sorter for a large industrial factory.

Sort boxes into their correct chutes and avoid getting canned by the foreman.

Controls:

  • Click on boxes to pick them up and drop them under the correct chute to sort them.
  • Hold "R" to view the order legend for the current day.
  • Hold "C" (on title screen) to view credits

Gameplay Video of Days 1-5
(If you would like to use all or parts of the video above in another project (or if you are Javid making a showcase and need it) please DM me on discord (pocketonion#8564) and I'll and I can provide you with the MP4 file.)
